# Repair and Overhaul - Air Turbine Pumps
## Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-VCI-008-29277
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Solicitation Number**: W8482-218163/A
* **Closing Date**: 22 March 2024, 14:00 (Eastern Time)
* **Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement

## Procurement Details

* **Request for Proposal (RFP)**: All interested suppliers may submit a bid
* **Competitive Procurement Strategy**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Nature of Requirements**: Repair and Overhaul of up to three Air Turbine Pump (ATP) sets
* **Delivery Date**: As soon as possible
* **Documents**: Bids may be submitted in either official language of Canada
* **Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement**: Not applicable

## Background

The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to Repair and Overhaul up to 3 Air Turbine Pump (ATP) sets, with an option to repair and overhaul an additional 2 quantities. The RFP solicits proposals from suppliers to perform the requirement according to the Statement of Work outlined in Annex A.

## Tender Description

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Bids will remain open for acceptance for a period of not less than 90 days from the closing date of the bid solicitation. The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements: CFTA, WTO- GPA, CETA, CPTPP, CKFTA.
